projects.title: VALCORE
projects.description: A Discord backup and assistant bot that uses Open Authorization 2.0 to safely move members to a backup server during critical outages. Used across 850+ servers.

projects.title: U.N.I.
projects.description: A tense Roblox survival game set in a post-apocalyptic NU Laguna, where players face a series of deadly trials, overcome harsh conditions, and compete to be the last one standing.

projects.title: Calibrium
projects.description: An Android app that works with an IoT device to instantly calculate a foodâ€™s calories from its weight, giving you accurate nutritional info in seconds.

projects.title: Coinvert
projects.description: An innovative Android app that transforms your loose change into usable digital coins by simply scanning the QR code on your receipt. It lets you instantly store, track, and spend your change without the hassle of carrying coins.
